original_text:
Then he will speak to them in his wrath,
    and terrify them in his fury, saying,
korean_text: 그 때에 분을 발하며 진노하사 그들을 놀라게 하여 이르시기를

sentences.original_text: Then he will speak to them in his wrath
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 그의 진노 중에 그들에게 말하시고

sentences.original_text: and terrify them in his fury
